casebody.data:
Michael Anthony TAYLOR, petitioner,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al. No. 13-8856 (13A867). Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 25, 2014. Justice GINSBURG, with whom Justice SOTOMAYOR and Justice KAGAN join, dissenting.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO

and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

For reasons well stated by Judge BYE in his statement calling for Eighth Circuit rehearing en banc, I would grant the stay and consider the petition for certiorari in the ordinary course.
